COLTRIN SUPERINTENDENT September 28, 1973 IN YOUR REPLY PLEASE REFER TO To whom it may concern: This certifies that Mr. o Alberto Acosta is an employee of the Southern Pacific Transportation Company since July 6, 1971 in our track Department.
